videos.headline: Charlotte attacks early with 57-yd TD
videos.description: Benny LeMay runs 57 yards for a touchdown on the opening drive for the 49ers.

videos.headline: Blue Raiders strike again with 5-yd TD
videos.description: Brent Stockstill connects with Ty Lee for the 2nd time for a 5-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Charlotte closes gap with 23-yd TD pass
videos.description: Evan Sheriffs throws to Mark Quattlebaum in the end zone for a 23-yard 49ers touchdown.
